scripts.test:apis:all: npm run test:apis:property-resolution && npm run test:apis:reservations && npm run test:apis:toxicity
scripts.test:apis:property-resolution: cd tests/bruno && source ./set-aws-creds.sh && cd booking_mock_apis && bru run PropertyResolution/Basic_Flow/01_Basic_Query.bru --env PropertyResolution
scripts.test:apis:reservations: cd tests/bruno && source ./set-aws-creds.sh && cd booking_mock_apis && bru run Reservations/Setup --env Reservations
scripts.test:apis:toxicity: cd tests/bruno && source ./set-aws-creds.sh && cd booking_mock_apis && bru run ToxicityDetection/Basic_Flow/01_Non_Toxic_Text.bru --env ToxicityDetection
